Text: The Hoysala Empire (Kannada: ಹೊಯ್ಸಳ ಸಾಮ್ರಾಜ್ಯ ) was a notable South Indian Kannadiga empire that ruled most of the modern-day state of Karnataka between the 10th to the 14th centuries.

--------------------
Text: Society of the Hoysala Empire:  The capital of the empire was initially based at Belur, and later transferred to Halebidu.
